definition.definition: A definition of the conducted experiment.

environment.definition: The environment in which the experiments were conducted. Classical environments are e.g. the Y-maze or T-maze. Some environments are called enriched also reduced or even natural.

individual_count.definition: The number of individuals that are observed/investigated at the same time.

paradigm.definition: The paradigm used in the experiment, e.g. Learning, navigation, etc...

protocol.definition: A description of the task protocol undertaken by the subject.
